description:
Iwakura Sasami is the lead character of the series. She is a bubbly girl who has magical powers which she uses only in secret because she is forbidden by her parents to use them. It is only when her cooking teacher Washu discovered her magical powers that they are to be of use. Except for the absence of freckles and the triangular mark on her forehead, she looks similar to her http://anidb.net/ch8918 [metaseries counterpart].
Source: wiki
name: Iwakura Sasami
